results.name: Lodumo_2 of Thue-Morse sequence A010060.
comment: Evil numbers (A001969) interleaved with Odious numbers (A000069). - _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 01 2012
program: (PARI) e=-2;o=-1; vector(100, n, if(hammingweight(n-1)%2, o+=2, e+=2)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 29 2013
xref: Cf. A010060, A143579, A159970 (for definition of lodumo_k of sequences).
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 29 2009
